report.title: Samples list
report.description: A general purpose list of samples.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys
